participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: An introverted individual who enjoys quiet activities and prefers to engage in deep conversations.
participant_1.background: Studying computer science, Alex has a passion for technology and gaming, but struggles with social interactions.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: An outgoing and cheerful person who loves meeting new people and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: Works as a community manager for a gaming company, Jamie has a strong connection with the gaming community and enjoys connecting with others.
